	cpfInvalido: '7bf5fbe9-2010-4fbc-9bb4-90d969d25976', // [EX.1.0.1][MSG] Cpf inválido
	extrato90dias: 'ceed5224-3b6e-40e6-a86d-f33c1917e669', // [EX.2.0.0][MSG] Extrato-Periodo a cima de 90 dias
	extratoLancamentoFuturo: 'fa645a51-3dd2-4213-aa2c-851275e1f1c8', // [EX.2.1.0][MSG] Extrato - Lançamento futuro

	extrato90dias: 'ceed5224-3b6e-40e6-a86d-f33c1917e669', // [EX.2.0.0][MSG] Extrato-Periodo a cima de 90 dias
	extratoLancamentoFuturo: 'fa645a51-3dd2-4213-aa2c-851275e1f1c8', // [EX.2.1.0][MSG] Extrato - Lançamento futuro
	'M.2.0.1': '220e2439-9123-414b-89d7-6d511707d27f',
	'M.3.1.1': 'f56b801b-39fe-4428-96c7-28d2d57d2190',
	'M.4.1.1': '27f2cef0-593c-4755-99ec-88d82ceb38de',

	'S.2.6.0': '8a22702f-61ed-4cec-bb66-c51f158c4cca',
	'data': '979b5402-311d-443b-80f7-1f68288b97b2',
	'valor': 'e7e5923a-5c40-469c-92b0-8977cecb7ae4',
	'MS.4.1.0': '2708d5d2-79bd-4096-a5bf-cf03ad6854a5',
	"MS.7.2.1": "c0b61b6f-1dd6-470b-a810-07a169872c7e",
	'MS.7.2.0': 'c09c4eec-e7e8-4142-a8ac-54b0e28a4133',
	'hora': '61cb5759-590c-41c9-8c77-2beeb585e551',
	'erroApiExtrato': 'f1a2dc4d-cf62-45b6-bc0a-5e3fd33f21eb',
	'periodoInvalido': 'b9d2f43a-c805-4a02-988f-d3ca6695bbea',
	'extratoSuperiorNoventaDias': '7fc4d159-9990-460b-84fb-64cf5adbfb46',

}
function run(errorCounter, exceptionType, state) {
	try {
		let { counter } = JSON.parse(errorCounter)
		const { stateNameOrigin } = JSON.parse(state)
		if (counter == 1) {
			if (exceptionType) {
				return exceptions[exceptionType] || '9e852fe8-7668-47b3-a71c-b620953b65a6' // [EX.7.0.0][MSG] Erro generico
			}
			return exceptions[stateNameOrigin] || '9e852fe8-7668-47b3-a71c-b620953b65a6' // [EX.7.0.0][MSG] Erro generico
		}
		if (counter == 2) {
			if (exceptionType) {
				return exceptionPersistente[exceptionType] || '9e852fe8-7668-47b3-a71c-b620953b65a6' // [EX.7.0.0][MSG] Erro generico
			}
			return exceptionPersistente[stateNameOrigin] || '9e852fe8-7668-47b3-a71c-b620953b65a6' // [EX.7.0.0][MSG] Erro generico
		}
		return exceptionPersistenteTerceiroErro[exceptionType] || '76371e33-3870-4b3b-b4cd-43a05493b194' // [EX.7.0.2][MSG] Erro generico (Finalização)
	}
	catch (err) {
		return '9e852fe8-7668-47b3-a71c-b620953b65a6'; // [EX.7.0.0][MSG] Erro generico
	}
}
